about.description:
This metapackage exists to define the Rubin Observatory common software
environment, including version specifications where needed, while allowing
users flexibility when installing additional packages into the same environment.
about.summary: Metapackage to install the Rubin Observatory's common software environment.

This metapackage exists to define the Rubin Observatory common software
environment, including version specifications where needed, while allowing
users flexibility when installing additional packages into the same environment.
about.summary: Metapackage to install the Rubin Observatory's common software environment.

This metapackage exists to define the Rubin Observatory common software
environment, including version specifications where needed, while allowing
users flexibility when installing additional packages into the same environment.
about.summary: Metapackage to install the Rubin Observatory's common software environment.

name: rubin-env

about.description:
This metapackage exists to define the Rubin Observatory common software
environment, including version specifications where needed, while allowing
users flexibility when installing additional packages into the same environment.
about.summary: Metapackage to install the Rubin Observatory's common software environment.

about.description:
This metapackage exists to define the Rubin Observatory common software
environment, including version specifications where needed, while allowing
users flexibility when installing additional packages into the same environment.
about.summary: Metapackage to install the Rubin Observatory's common software environment.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "rubin-env" %}
{% set version = "9.0.0" %}
{% set build_number = 0 %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

build:
  skip: True  # [python_impl == 'pypy' or win or py != 311]
  number: {{ build_number }}

outputs:
  - name: rubin-env-nosysroot
    script: build-nosysroot.sh
    # Since all requirements are required "at run time" for the
    # Rubin developers, all requirements are fundamentally
    # run requirements. However, we've attempted to organize
    # requirements as build-like, host-like, or run-like, in
    # order inform any evolution of this recipe.
    requirements:
      host:
        - python
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ compiler('fortran') }}
        - apr
        - cfitsio
        - curl
        - fftw
        - gsl
        - libaprutil
        - libblas
        - libcblas
        - liblapack
        - liblapacke
        - log4cxx
        - minuit2
        - numpy
        - starlink-ast
        - wcslib
        - xpa
      run_constrained:
        - impi_rt == 9999999999999
      run:
        # jq is special - it is needed for the pin-it utility in this package
        - jq >=1.7.1
        ###################################################
        # build-like dependencies
        # As part of our scons build process, we do run tests, so
        # these really are required to perform a build.
        # Note that "testing" in conda-forge should be limited to testing
        # successful packaging, and not testing code.
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ compiler('fortran') }}
        # The above are needed to get the official conda-forge versions.
        # The below is needed to get convenience symlinks for users to invoke.
        - compilers >=1.7.0
        - cmake >=3.28.1
        - coverage >=7.3.3
        - coveralls >=1.8.0
        - doxygen >=1.9.8
        - eups >=2.2.8
        - flake8 ==7.1.0
        - make >=4.3
        - meson >=1.3.0
        - nose >=1.3.7
        - pep8-naming >=0.13.3
        - pip >=23.3.2
        - psutil >=5.9.7
        - pytest >=8.2.0
        - pytest-cov >=4.1.0
        - pytest-doctestplus >=1.1.0
        - pytest-openfiles >=0.5.0
        - pytest-runner >=6.0.0
        - pytest-session2file >=0.1.11
        - pytest-subtests >=0.11.0
        - pytest-vcr >=1.0.2
        - pytest-xdist >=3.5.0
        - scons >=4.6.0

        ###################################################
        # host-like and run-like
        # These are mostly run-like, but for the same reasons as
        # above, we need most of these at build time, so they are mostly
        # host-like
        - apr {{ apr }}.*
        - cffi {{ cffi }}.*
        - cfitsio {{ cfitsio }}.*
        - eigen {{ eigen }}.*
        - gsl {{ gsl }}.*
        - libaprutil {{ libaprutil }}.*
        - libboost-python-devel {{ libboost_python_devel }}.*
        - libcxx {{ libcxx }}.*  # [not aarch64]
        - llvmlite
        - log4cxx {{ log4cxx }}.*
        - minuit2 {{ minuit2 }}.*
        - ndarray {{ ndarray }}.*
        - ndarray >=1.6.4
        - numba
        - numpy {{ numpy }}.*
        - starlink-ast {{ starlink_ast }}.*
        - wcslib {{ wcslib }}.*
        - xpa {{ xpa }}.*
        - yaml-cpp {{ yaml_cpp }}.*

        ###################################################
        # run-like
        - alembic >=1.13.0
        - astropy >=6.0.0
        - astroquery >=0.4.6
        - autograd >=1.6.2
        - backoff >=2.2.1
        - batoid >=0.7.3
        - batoid-rubin >=0.5.0
        - boto3 >=1.34.4
        - bottleneck >=1.3.7
        - cassandra-driver >=3.28.0  # [linux64]
        - click >=8.1.7
        - coloredlogs >=15.0.1
        - colour-science >=0.4.4
        # conda is required for runtime inspection of installed software
        - conda >=23.11.0
        - configparser >=5.3.0
        - danish >=0.5.0
        - defusedxml >=0.7.1
        - deprecated >=1.2.14
        - dustmaps >=1.0.12
        - emcee >=3.1.4
        - esutil >=0.6.11
        - fastavro >=1.9.1
        - firefly-client >=3.0.2
        - fitsio >=1.2.1
        - fitsverify >=4.22
        - frozendict >=2.3.10
        - fsspec >=2024.6.1
        - future >=0.18.3
        - galsim >=2.5.2
        - getcalspec >=2.1.0
        - git >=2.42.0,!=2.45.1
        - git-lfs >=3.4.1
        - h5py >=3.10.0
        - healpy >=1.16.6
        - healsparse >=1.8.1
        - hpgeom >=1.2.0
        - htcondor >=23.0,<23.1
        - humanize >=4.9.0
        - idds-client >=2.0.9
        - idds-doma >=2.0.9
        - iminuit >=2.24.0
        - lmfit >=1.2.2,<1.3
        - lsstdesc.coord >=1.3.0
        - lsst-ts-xml >=20.1.0
        - matplotlib-base >=3.9
        - moto >=5.0.6
        - mpi4py >=3.1.5
        - nest-asyncio >=1.5.8
        - networkx >=3.2.1
        - ngmix-core >=2.3.0
        - numexpr >=2.8.7,<3
        - opencv >=4.9.0
        - {{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}
        - packaging >=23.2
        - panda-client >=1.5.70
        - pandas >=2.1.4,<3
        - parsl ==2024.4.29
        - patch >=2.7.6
        - pgcli >=3.5.0
        - photutils >=1.8.0
        - piff >=1.3.3
        - prmon >=3.0.2  # [linux]
        - psycopg2 >=2.9.9,<3
        - pyarrow >=14.0.2
        - pybind11 >=2.12.0
        - pydantic >=2.7.1,<3
        - pyld >=2.0.3
        - pysynphot >=2.0.0
        - pytables >=3.9.2
        - python >=3.11,<3.12
        - python-confluent-kafka >=1.9.2,<2
        - pytorch >=2.1.0
        - pyyaml >=6.0.1
        - requests >=2.31.0
        - rucio-clients >=34.3.0
        - ruff ==0.5.2
        - s3fs >=2024.6.1
        - schwimmbad >=0.3.2
        - scikit-image >=0.22.0
        - scikit-learn >=1.3.2
        - scipy >=1.13.0,<1.14
        - seaborn >=0.13.0
        - skyproj >=1.2.3
        - sorcha >=0.9.1
        - spherematch >=0.10.1
        - sqlalchemy >=2.0.23
        - sqlite >=3.44.2
        - threadpoolctl >=3.2.0
        - torchvision >=0.16.1
        - tqdm >=4.66.1
        - treecorr >=4.3.3,<5
        - webdav4 >=0.9.8
        - ws4py >=0.5.1

    test:
      commands:
        # grep pin-it output for python dependency
        - pin-it rubin-env-nosysroot | grep "python="
        # ensure binary compatibility; bump major version if not
        - '[ $(echo __GXX_ABI_VERSION | ${CXX} -E - | tail -1) == 1017 ]'  # [linux]
        - '[ $(echo __GXX_ABI_VERSION | ${CXX} -E - | tail -1) == 1002 ]'  # [osx]

  - name: rubin-env
    requirements:
      host:
        - python
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("rubin-env-nosysroot", exact=True) }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - python
    test:
      commands:
        # grep pin-it output for python dependency
        - pin-it rubin-env | grep "python="
        # ensure binary compatibility; bump major version if not
        - '[ $(echo __GXX_ABI_VERSION | ${CXX} -E - | tail -1) == 1017 ]'  # [linux]
        - '[ $(echo __GXX_ABI_VERSION | ${CXX} -E - | tail -1) == 1002 ]'  # [osx]

  - name: rubin-env-rsp
    requirements:
      host:
        - python
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("rubin-env", exact=True) }}
        # All are from sciplat-lab unless otherwise stated
        - astroplan >=0.10 # sims
        - astrowidgets >=0.3.0
        - awkward >=2.6.4
        - awkward-pandas >=2023.8.0
        - black ==24.4
        - bokeh >=3.3.2
        - bqplot >=0.12.43
        - ciso8601 >=2.3.1
        - cloudpickle >=3.0.0
        - cookiecutter >=2.6.0
        - dash >=2.17.0
        - dask-core >=2024.5.0
        - datashader >=0.16.0
        - fastparquet >=2024.2.0
        - ffmpeg >=4.4.0
        - freetype-py >=2.4.0
        - gcsfs >=2024.3.1
        - geoviews >=1.12.0
        - gh >=2.46.0  # 2.49.0 is not available on aarch64
        - ginga >=5.0.1
        - graphviz >=9.0.0
        - hatch-jupyter-builder >=0.9.1
        - hatch-nodejs-version >=0.3.2
        - hatchling >=1.24.2
        - hdf5plugin >=4.4.0
        - holoviews >=1.18.3
        - httpx >=0.27.0
        - hvplot >=0.9.0
        - imagemagick >=7.1.1_21
        - intake >=2.0.5
        - intake-parquet >=0.3.0
        - ipyevents >=2.0.2
        - ipykernel >=6.29.3
        - ipympl >=0.9.4
        - ipyvolume >=0.6.3
        - ipywidgets >=8.1.2
        - isort >=5.13.2
        - jedi >=0.19.1
        - jupyter >=1.0.0
        - jupyter-packaging >=0.12.3
        - jupyter-resource-usage >=1.0.2
        - jupyter-server-proxy >=4.1.2
        - jupyter_bokeh >=4.0.4
        - jupyterhub >=4.1.5
        - jupyterlab >=4.1.8,<5
        - jupyterlab-variableinspector >=3.2.1
        - jupyterlab_execute_time >=3.1.2
        - jupyterlab_iframe >=0.5.0
        - jupyterlab_widgets >=3.0.10
        - lsst-efd-client >=0.12.0
        - mypy >=1.7.1
        - mysqlclient >=2.2.1
        - nb_black ==1.0.7
        - nbconvert-webpdf >=7.7.1
        - nbdime >=4.0.1
        - nbval >=0.11.0
        - nodejs >=20.12.2
        - panel >=1.4.2
        - papermill >=2.6.0
        - paramnb >=2.0.4
        - partd >=1.4.1
        - pep8 >=1.7.1
        - pkg-config >=0.29.2
        - plotly >=5.22.0
        - pre-commit >=3.6.0
        - pyflakes >=3.0.1
        - pypandoc >=1.13
        - pyshp >=2.3.1
        - python-snappy >=0.7.1
        - python-socketio >=5.11.2
        - pythreejs >=2.4.2
        - pyviz_comms >=3.0.1
        - pyvo >=1.5
        - regions >=0.9
        - ripgrep >=14.0.3
        - rubin-scheduler >=1.1.1
        - rubin-sim >=2.0.0
        - sbpy >=0.3.0
        - schedview >=0.11.1
        - sidecar >=0.7.0
        - snappy >=1.1.10
        - terminado >=0.18.1
        - toolz >=0.12.1
        - wget >=1.21.4
        - xarray >=2024.3.0
        - yarn >=4.2.1
    test:
      commands:
        # grep pin-it output for yarn dependency
        - pin-it rubin-env-rsp | grep "yarn="

  - name: rubin-env-developer
    requirements:
      host:
        - python
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("rubin-env", exact=True) }}
        - astrowidgets >=0.3
        - black ==24.4
        - bokeh >=3.3.2
        - clang-format >=18.0.0
        - dask-jobqueue >=0.8.5
        - datashader >=0.16.0
        - fastparquet >=2024.2.0
        - ffmpeg >=4.4.0
        - holoviews >=1.18.3
        - hvplot >=0.9.0
        - imagemagick >=7.1.1_21
        - ipdb >=0.13.13
        - ipympl >=0.9.4
        - ipython >=8.22.2
        - isort >=5.13.2
        - jedi >=0.19.1
        - jupyter >=1.0.0
        - jupyterlab >=4.1.8,<5
        - jupyterlab_server >=2.27.1
        - line_profiler >=4.1.1
        - lsst-documenteer-pipelines ==0.8.2
        - lsst-documenteer-technote ==0.8.2
        - lsst-efd-client >=0.12.0
        - mypy >=1.7.1
        - mysqlclient >=2.2.1
        - panel >=1.4.2
        - pep8 >=1.7.1
        - postgresql >=16.2
        - pre-commit >=3.6.0
        - pyct >=0.5.0
        - pydocstyle >=6.3.0
        - pyflakes >=3.0.1
        - pytest-profiling >=1.7.0
        - python-build >=1.2.1
        - pyvo >=1.5
        - ripgrep >=14.0.3
        - snakeviz >=2.2.0
        - sphinx-automodapi >=0.16.0,!=0.17.0
        - types-deprecated >=1.2.9.20240311
        - types-pkg_resources >=0.1.3
        - types-python-dateutil >=2.9.0.20240316
        - types-pyyaml >=6.0.12.20240311
        - types-requests >=2.31.0.6
        - types-setuptools >=69.5.0.20240423
        - types-urllib3 >=1.26.25.14
    test:
      commands:
        # grep pin-it output for black dependency
        - pin-it rubin-env-developer | grep "black"

  - name: rubin-env-extras
    requirements:
      host:
        - python
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("rubin-env", exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage("rubin-env-rsp", exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage("rubin-env-developer", exact=True) }}
        - rubin-sim >=2.0.0
    test:
      commands:
        # grep pin-it output for rubin-env-developer dependency
        # Can't do rubin-sim due to lack of ARM
        - pin-it rubin-env-extras | grep "rubin-env-developer"

about:
  home: https://github.com/conda-forge/rubinenv-feedstock
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: Metapackage to install the Rubin Observatory's common software environment.

  description: |
    This metapackage exists to define the Rubin Observatory common software
    environment, including version specifications where needed, while allowing
    users flexibility when installing additional packages into the same environment.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mwittgen
    - timj
    - ktlim
    - erykoff
    - beckermr
    - roceb
